roleset.name: nearer to the point of origin (or other point of ref.)

role.descr: point of reference arg1 is near to

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on Medi-seed corpus.

example.name: both args
example.text: This measures 36 mm x 46 mm at its largest , which-1 [*-1] is just proximal to the aortic bifurcation .
